summary: The 'Heroes Owning and Materializing Equity Act of 2025' (HOME Act) amends Title 38 of the United States Code to improve veterans' access to housing and financial support. It modifies Department of Veterans Affairs guidance to lenders regarding veterans' residual income, including nonprofit financial service organizations. The bill mandates the creation of a database of adapted homes for sale and directs the Secretary to conduct outreach to veterans in U.S. Territories regarding benefits eligibility.
